articles.title: Colon cancer growing danger for particular age group, San Antonio doctor says - KSAT San Antonio
articles.description: March is Colorectal Cancer Awareness Month; the American Cancer Society estimates that 53,000 Americans will die from it in 2024.
articles.content:
SAN ANTONIO Its one of the deadliest cancers in America. But do you know the signs of colorectal cancer?

articles.title: Donald Trump wanted trial delays, and he's getting them. Hush-money case is latest to be put off - ABC News
articles.description: Delays in Donald Trump’s criminal cases are increasing the possibility Americans will be deep into the presidential election season before they know whether or not he has been convicted of any wrongdoing
